attributes.action: Make it compulsory for an exam consisting logic and math for registering to vote
attributes.additional_details:
Who is J.S.Mill:  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Stuart_Mill
Outline of this idea comes from: http://resourcelists.stir.ac.uk/items/E53CBD27-15A4-EFF2-3152-58F3BE2E7301.html
attributes.background: In the general lines of the conception of democracy, British philosopher Mill proposed that votes should be valued according to the standards of education of citizens.

rejection.details:
The link to the treatise on which your proposal is based does not appear to work without logging in. Without this supplemental information, your petition does not call for sufficiently clear action from the UK Government or Parliament. You might like to sign this petition, which is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/149432

Alternatively, you could start a new petition, calling for clear and specific action from Parliament or the Government.
